PluginData.Author: Hailfire + dogboy
PluginData.Tooltip: New visual effects for thrusters(customizable), RocketFX compatible
PluginData.Description: Tired of yellow thruster flames? Blue ion thrusters don't look good with your neon red spaceship? We get it. That's why we made this mod for you! Now with this mod you can not only change the color of the thruster, but also its effects without any problems, with just one mouse click - expand your possibilities with Hydrogen Plus today!
